price: Višebošci između Njega i džina srodstvo uspostavljaju, a džini odavno znaju da će takvi u Vatru biti privedeni,
arabic: وَجَعَلُواْ بَيۡنَهُۥ وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡجِنَّةِ نَسَبٗاۚ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمَتِ ٱلۡجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمۡ لَمُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalū baynahu wabayna al-jinati nasaban walaqad ʿalimati al-jinatu innahum lamuḥ'ḍarūna
